channel.title: [PI] Background Changing [PI]
channel.description: Hello. Again. I'm currently using a PI client and i'm used to delta. And i was wondering. How would i go about changing the Background of my Client? If someone could give me a link to a tutorial or something or just let me know how to do it. I will greatly appreciate it.

item.title: [PI] Background Changing [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ljoxaa ljoxaa
item.description:
@ljoxaa wrote:

look in ur sprites there should be ur background picture just change it or edit and do what you want its easy

Read full topic
